Text:
Yeah, great quality, thank you! 
But I have really hard time finding English subtitles. Does anyone know where to get them, please?
Sorry, I put the comment to the wrong season. Actually I meant Season 1. (http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5867318/The_4400_-_Season_1_Complete.HDTV%28Sky1%29_900p_x264)
Have found that these have been fantastic copies :) thank you so much - cant even get any seasons of this show in Australia!
